I second that as well.

I created a number of handy add ons for 1.12, and w=
ant to know how
much refactoring is needed to run them under 2.0.

Also, wi=
ll there be a tool to convert order.xml files to the new
sheets format. I h=
ave a number of order.xml files that I created threw
trail and error, and d=
on't want to go threw that painful process again :)

I also would like to l=
earn more about URL ranking in 2.0, because that
seems to be the most impor=
tant new feature to me. Can this feature be
dropped down to the 1.12 branch=
?

ote:
